conclusion: Analyze forces using Newton's laws of motion.
Metal guide rail at angle Î± with a groove and a ball inside; rope connects ball to pillow.
Identify forces on the ball and child/pillow.
Ball has gravitational force, tension, and normal force.
Child and pillow have gravitational force, tension, and normal force.
Resolve forces on the ball along and perpendicular to the guide rail.
Resolve forces on the child and pillow along and perpendicular to the guide rail.
Solve for acceleration a using equations along the guide rail.
Calculate tension T using acceleration a.
Determine force exerted by the pillow on the child.
Calculate ratio of tension to force exerted by the pillow on the child.
